channel.description: Recent content in creative-coding on Barney

item.title: Creative Coding
item.description: Below are a collection of gifs from various little projects I’ve done. None of them are really big enough to warrent their own post, but I think that they’re fun to look at and wanted to share them. These were all made using Processing. I’ve also linked GitHub repos where applicable. If you have any questions regarding any of these or would like more information, feel free to get in touch!
